title: Looking for a mentor/coach.
body: Hey im currently Bronze 1 nearly silver5 and im looking for a coach and someone that can spend some time teaching me, and helping me progress and get better at the game. would much appreciate it if someone will help :) also im willing to take on any role in the game. i currently play mid jg and sometimes top. but im willing to learn other things. {{champion:4}}

replies.body: Add "BeefyBill". He's Diamond, the coach for a semi-pro team, and offers free coaching. He's coached me in the past.
okay i will do so now, thank you.
